docs.snippet: Mr. Conlin was honored by Baseball’s Hall of Fame in 2011, the same year a newspaper article detailed several accounts of sexual abuse he was accused of committing....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Conlin was honored by Baseball’s Hall of Fame in 2011, the same year a newspaper article detailed several accounts of sexual abuse he was accused of committing.
docs.abstract: Bill Conlin, sports columnist who was honored by the Baseball Hall of Fame but quit after child-molestation accusations, dies at age 79.

headline.main: Bill Conlin, Sportswriter Who Quit After Molestation Claims, Dies at 79
headline.print_headline: Bill Conlin, Sportswriter, 79; Quit After Molestation Claims

docs.abstract: New York Yankees cut outfielder Vernon Wells in order to make room for left-handed relief pitcher Matt Thornton, who signs two-year, $7 million deal.

headline.main: Yankees Sign Reliever (Matt Thornton) and Cut Outfielder (Vernon Wells)

docs.snippet: Alex Rodriguez, widely considered one of the greatest baseball players of all time, was suspended for the entire 2014 Major League Baseball (MLB) season and playoffs for violating the league's drug policy and labor contract after an arbitrator on ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez, widely considered one of the greatest baseball players of all time, was suspended for the entire 2014 Major League Baseball (MLB) season and playoffs for violating the league's drug policy and labor contract after an arbitrator on Saturday rejected the All-Star third baseman's appeal.
